title: Fra Diavolo
creator_credit: Francesco Cancellieri, George Richfield, Richfield Operatic Films and Official Films
brief_description: A condensed version of Aubor’s comic opera in three acts. The film preserves the dramatic continuity of the complete opera and includes the major scenes and musical passages. Photographed on the stage of the opera house of Rome, sung in Italian by La Scala Opera Company with Nino Adami in the role of Fra Diavolo.
